label: Telegram to John E. Wise, Vice-President of the Medical College, from Isaiah Bennett
description: Telegram to John E. Wise, Vice-President of the Medical College, from Isaiah Bennett requesting a conference for union recognition on 1969-02-21.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
1240P EST FEB 19 69 AB079
A CNA138 COPY PDF CHARLESTON SOCAR 19 1230P EST

[J]OHN E WISE, DLY 751 VICE PRESIDENT
MEDICAL COLLEGE OF SOUTH CAROLINA 80 BARRE ST CHARLESTON
SOCAR
DEAR MR. WISE:
ON BEHALF OF' THE DULY ELECTED REPRESENTATIVES OF LICENSED
PRACTICAL NURSES AND NON-PROFESSIONAL EMPLOYEES OF THE MEDICAL
COLLEGE HOSPITAL, WE REQUEST A CONFERENCE TO DISCUSS UNION
RECOGNITION ON FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 21, 1969, AT 1:30 P.M SINCERELY
ISAIAH BENNETT ORGANIZER OF HOSPITAL WORKERS IN SOUTH CAROLINA
(1236).
